Service.legal_advice: Legal advice is the use of specialists in the field of law to obtain the correct legal opinion on a subject that may or may not be the subject of dispute, where the lawyer explains the appropriate solution and legally sound behavior for this situation.
Service.parties_issue: Issues in general are the thing or issue that is in dispute between parties or a group of parties...
Service.legal_document: A legal memorandum is a legal document submitted to the competent authority, whether to the department examining the case or...
Service.contract_desc: The contract is the law of the contracting parties, and it is the cornerstone of guaranteeing legitimate rights and duties between many parties as well as between...
Service.contract_more: The contract is the law of the contracting parties, and it is the cornerstone of ensuring legitimate rights and duties between many parties as well as between members of society. Therefore, paying attention to drafting contracts in the correct legal form spares all parties from resorting to judicial disputes of various kinds, and here it is necessary to refer to experienced contract drafting experts who are fully knowledgeable. By legal rules.
Service.memoirs_legal_desc: A legal memorandum is a legal document submitted to the competent authority, whether to the department examining the case or...
Service.memoirs_legal_more: A legal memorandum is a legal document submitted to the competent authority, whether it is the department hearing the case, the court of appeal, or the Supreme Court. These memorandums include the facts of the case documented with evidence and evidence, along with their dates. In addition to the facts, there are formal and substantive defenses issued by the plaintiff’s lawyer. Or the plaintiff.
Service.issues_desc: Issues in general are the thing or issue that is in dispute between parties or a group of parties...
Service.issues_more: Issues in general are the thing or issue that is disputed between parties or a group of parties, where the first party who filed the lawsuit is called (the plaintiff) or the second party against whom the lawsuit was filed is called (the defendant). The second party who filed the lawsuit is called (the defendant). A lawsuit has been filed against him (the defendant).

More.Our lawyers are licensed by the Ministry: Our lawyers are licensed by the Ministry of Justice
More.About Shura for legal services and consu: About Shura for legal services and consultations
More.why-us-text: Shura is a digital platform concerned with providing legal consultations and services remotely in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia by connecting clients requesting legal consultations with an elite group of lawyers licensed and accredited by the Saudi Ministry of Justice in an interactive, easy, safe and professional manner based on the laws while maintaining the confidentiality and privacy of data. Customers. Legal consultation includes several areas, including: the areas of personal status, labor disputes, and commercial litigation for individuals, institutions, and public and private sector companies, including emerging, medium, and small companies.
More.call-us-text: If you encounter any obstacle or problem, please contact us.
More.faq-heading: Frequently asked questions about Shura Legal Services

Landing.platform: Shwra is a digital platform specialized in providing services and legal advice to business owners and companies. This is done by connecting companies and business owners seeking legal services with an elite group of specialized lawyers licensed by the Saudi Ministry of Justice. Shwra provides its services around the clock, to all regions of the Kingdom, with professionalism, high quality, effective communication, and complete confidentiality. Its packages can also be customized according to the company’s needs, which always keeps the company and business owners in the right legal direction.
Landing.legl_desc: We provide legal and legal advice to clients in all systems
